sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均有"自愿的"之意。
means: voluntary ： 使用广泛，侧重不受约束，行动不为其他影响所左右。
willing ： 着重自愿、令人愉快或急切地去行动。

sentence.Network_en: He is always eager for new experiences and ever-willing to experiment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他总是渴望拥有新的经历，而且永远愿意尝试。

sentence.Network_en: He was watching her fixedly, willing her to look at him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他凝视着她，希望她也看他。

sentence.Network_en: He was willing to make any sacrifice for peace.
sentence.Network_cn: 他愿意为和平作出任何牺牲。

Ugly Betty 丑女贝蒂第一季... ... -Amanda:Because... 因为... -Amanda:He will. 他会的 I'll just wait. 我会等着那一天的.
限缩故意侵权(willful infringement)的构成要件(第17条)：明订凡未事先徵询法务顾问意见者不构成故意侵权。这也是以立法的方式重申 …

entry.def: If someone is willing to do something, they are fairly happy about doing it and will do it if they are asked or required to do it.

example.ex: The military now say they're willing to hold talks with the political parties...
example.tran: 军方现在说，他们愿意与政党进行谈判。

example.ex: There are, of course, questions which she will not be willing to answer.
example.tran: 当然，有些问题是她不愿回答的。

entry.tran: 自愿的;愿意的;积极肯干的
entry.def: Willing is used to describe someone who does something fairly enthusiastically and because they want to do it rather than because they are forced to do it.

example.ex: Have the party on a Saturday, when you can get your partner and other willing adults to help...
example.tran: 把聚会安排在周六，这样你就可以找自己的搭档和其他愿意帮把手的成年人来帮忙了。

example.ex: Although he had had no formal engineering training he was a natural and willing pupil.
example.tran: 虽然他没有接受过正规工科训练，但却是个天生好学的学生。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of making a choice;

sentences.sentence: "followed my father of my own volition"

means.word_mean: 2. not brought about by coercion or force;

sentences.sentence: "the spirit indeed is willing but the flesh is weak"- Matthew 26:41

auth_sentence.content: Must be willing to work with mice and rats.
auth_sentence.res_content: Must be willing to work with mice and rats.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Must be willing to work with mice and rats.

auth_sentence.content: Longer-term investors willing to take risks can start adding.
auth_sentence.res_content: Longer-term investors willing to take risks can start adding.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Longer-term investors willing to take risks can start adding.

auth_sentence.content: You should be ready and willing to accept feedback.
auth_sentence.res_content: You should be ready and willing to accept feedback.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You should be ready and willing to accept feedback.

Sentence.sentence: To what extent are Americans really willing to endure the environmental impacts of domestic energy production in order to cut back imports?
Someone willing to work beyond regular hours.
He often says he is willing to help, but he never seems to have time.
not everybody is willing or ready to respond
Campuses willing to adopt convenient schedules along with more focused, less-expensive degrees may find that they have a competitive advantage in attracting bright, motivated students.
According to the speaker, why are some people willing to spend their money on travel these days?

sentences.en: He is a willing horse but he always seems to get the rotten jobs.
sentences.cn: 他是个乐于帮忙的人, 可是他似乎总是做倒霉的事情。

sentences.en: He doesn't work well, but he's always willing.
sentences.cn: 他活儿干得不好, 不过他总是愿意干。

sentences.en: I am willing to help you.
Are you willing that he should be allowed to join in?

sentences.cn: 她是一位志愿工作人员。

sentences.en: Nothing is impossible to a willing mind.
sentences.cn: 世上无难事, 只怕有心人。

jushi.chinese: 她是一位自愿的劳动者。
她是一位热心的帮助者。
